text: Rear Admiral Eric Green (died 25 January 2014)EULOGY FOR RETIRED REAR ADMIRAL ERIC GREEN BY HIS WIFE NIKKI was a retired South African Navy officer who served as Flag Officer Fleet from 1999 to 2005, when he retired. He also commanded the supply ship His decorations include the Southern Cross Decoration and the Medal for Distinguished Conduct and Loyal Service for 40 years service. He died in 2014. ==References== Category:South African admirals Category:Year of birth missing Category:2014 deaths Category:Place of death missing Category:Place of birth missing
title: Eric Green (admiral)
